contents:
加拿大总理称是伊朗自己不小心用俄制导弹打下来的
BREAKING: Canadian PM Trudeau: “We have intelligence from multiple sources, including our allies and our own intelligence. The evidence indicates that the plane was shot down by an Iranian surface-to-air missile. This may well have been unintentional.” https://t.co/RCx5O5d936 https://t.co/r5vnu2cwvJ
